# zitadel_action_execution_event (Resource)

Resource representing an action execution triggered by an event.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `all` (Boolean) Trigger on all events.
- `event` (String) The specific event to trigger on, e.g., `user.human.added`
- `group` (String) The event group to trigger on, e.g., `user.human`
- `target_ids` (List of String) The list of target IDs to call.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
